official-title.#text:
To amend the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 to clarify the eligibility requirements with
			 respect to railroad Hours of Service employees.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Railroad Hours of Service Employees Technical Corrections Act
